### Tender Announcement
#### ET025-230780 - Cross Connection Plumbing - Design-Build Services - RFP

---

**Contract Details**

* Reference Number: WS3817081261-Doc3817158347
* Solicitation Number: WS3817081261
* Publication Date: January 9, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 5

**Procurement Information**

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Category: Construction Services
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Cost-per-Point
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Project Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide design-build services for cross connection plumbing at the AAFC Morden Research and Development Centre (MRDC) potable water system. The project includes the design and construction of cross connection control devices and reconfiguration of water infrastructure to eliminate potential cross connections.

**Important Details**

* A mandatory site visit is required. Please refer to SI02 for more details.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 7, 2023, by 2:00 PM EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**

* Contact Person: Vinay Singh (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* To access the tender, please visit: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15080615?extsite=MTUwODA2MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
